keyword: how many calories is in a sausage mcmuffin
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage McMuffin?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in a sausage mcmuffin (about 480 kcal), plus protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick variations for your breakfast choice.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage McMuffin?
assumptions: McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; standard US menu preparation.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, and menu changes; values approximate from official data. Check McDonald's app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage McMuffin provides ~480 kcal, 21 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for the standard Sausage McMuffin with Egg.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per Sausage McMuffin.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in a sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: 31 g total fat (13 g saturated) and 830 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a sausage mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Yes, around 30 g carbs including 2 g fiber from the English muffin.

faqs.q: Does the Sausage McMuffin have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 0.5 g trans fat per serving from the sausage.
